nodes.text: Stonroy Soma was a male Alderaanian who served as an aide to Senator Bail Antilles at the time of the Naboo Crisis, a duty he shared with Liana Merian and Agrippa Aldrete. A man with brown hair, light skin and rosy cheeks, Soma donned a draped overcloak of mauve fabric ornated with square motifs and golden lining, under which he wore an ankle-length white tunic.

Stonroy Soma was to appear as a background character in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, in which he was portrayed by an unidentified extra. He was a member of the Alderaanian delegation led by Bail Organa, who was then played by Adrian Dunbar.
